title: Sound On: Ukraine Funding and Baby Formula Shortage
itunes:title: Sound On: Ukraine Funding and Baby Formula Shortage
description:
Virginia Senator Tim Kaine discusses aid for Ukraine, NATO and President Biden's trip to Asia. Virginia Rep. Abigail Spanberger talks about the shortage of baby formula. Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis join to break it all down.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
